name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
What about the war within?
There is no war within .
But then the look in his eyes gives it all away
.
.

K.A.B.I.R
#DecodingKabir https://t.co/FO9GDyc6GD

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
He is ok with others judging him. He stands by himself. 
He stands tall. 
Yet he nods a greet, cause he still has compassion for the ones judging him.
.

Kabir‚Äôs thoughts when he sees Nafisa.
.
K.A.B.I.R

#DecodingKabir https://t.co/jQsmaRIHld

name: Hrithik Roshan

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
‚ÄòBeyond this place of wrath and tears , looms but the horror of the shade,
And yet the menace of the years, finds, and shall find me unafraid.‚Äô
.
He had heard these lines somewhere. It stuck with him .
.
.
K.A.B.I.R 

#DecodingKabir https://t.co/aUOMNeTs5i

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
You‚Äôll keep beating him down
N yet there he sits, on his throne.
He owns this space 
This is his party 
And you were actually invited.
Now beat him again . Go on 
I dare you .
.
K.A.B.I.R 

#DecodingKabir https://t.co/AZuABX1EtY

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
He looks at her searching within,that lost feeling, he is not himself. He feels it, yet denies it. It surprises him. Something fills him yet he feels empty too.
Staring at impending doom, he yearns to be torn again .
Yet he doesn‚Äôt ma...https://t.co/5DImTpnlfD 

#DecodingKabir https://t.co/h6vvwPMvOY

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
If he looks at you do not make eye contact.
Just stay safe.
.
K.A.B.I.R

#DecodingKabir https://t.co/kGJX8H7dIM

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
There is a child in him who‚Äôs angry.
A rebel in him who‚Äôs calm.
There is the ultimate lover in him who doesn‚Äôt believe in love.
There is a saint in him who‚Äôs cocky. 
And there is the man in him who can‚Äôt find himself. 
And somewhere some...https://t.co/wSxsSOVfO3

name: Hrithik Roshan
text:
He loves it.

Staring at the giant like a bigger giant.
He knows the giant knows he‚Äôs not a giant.
But he also knows that the giant is not really sure.

K.A.B.I.R.

#DecodingKabir https://t.co/Qz8Q7qxdFv
